title: Here’s How The Insiders Scam You (Ep 1749)
description:
The Elon Musk / Twitter story has exposed the ongoing war on Americans by the elites. In this episode, I address the scam and how it works. 

News Picks:

The Hillary Clinton “collusion” scandal is getting spicy.


Are you being spied on? Is Pegasus on your phone?

Things haven’t been this bad economically since the early 1980s.


Water is in short supply in the West.

Blackrock has connections inside the White House.


Florida has its own Jussie Smollett.
